results.idea: Short-term momentum in business news sentiment
results.description: Uses rp_css_business (high userCount/alphaCount) as primary signal. Applied SUGGESTION1 (single datafield focus) and SUGGESTION3 (ts_backfill because coverage=0.5). Did not apply VECTOR wrapping (no vector field). Confidence set based on large userCount and topicality. Confidence: 0.75.

results.idea: Earnings event surprise using event sentiment z-score
results.description: Uses rp_ess_earnings (event sentiment) with backfill to handle coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied (use high-quality event field). No vector wrapping. Confidence moderate-high due to earnings importance. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Disagreement: composite vs event earnings sentiment
results.description: Combines rp_css_earnings and rp_ess_earnings to capture divergence. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multi-field) and SUGGESTION3 for both fields. Kept operators few to respect KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.78.
Uses rp_css_inverstor (high userCount). Applied ts_backfill. Focused on single strong datafield per SUGGESTION4. Confidence: 0.74.

results.idea: Projected impact spikes vs current composite
results.description: Compare rp_nip_inverstor (impact projection) to rp_css_inverstor to detect unexpected impact. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.76.
Uses nws18_ghc_lna (change in analyst recommendation). Applied ts_backfill and short ts_zscore to capture sudden changes. SUGGESTION4 applied (high alphaCount). Confidence: 0.70.
Uses rp_ess_mna (event sentiment for M&A) with backfill and short-term zscore to trade post-announcement momentum. SUGGESTION1 and 3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Uses rp_css_mna to capture market reaction trend to M&A coverage. Backfilled and measured ts_return momentum. SUGGESTION1 and 3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Compare rp_css_price sentiment to rp_nip_price impact projection. Two-field combo per SUGGESTION1 and backfilled both. Confidence: 0.73.
Uses rp_ess_legal (event legal sentiment) to catch downside risk spikes. Backfilled and zscored. SUGGESTION4 partially applied (moderate userCount). Confidence: 0.60.
Compare rp_css_revenue and rp_nip_ratings to capture revenue sentiment that contradicts analyst ratings impact. Both backfilled. SUGGESTIONS 1 and 3 applied. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after strong positive editorial
results.description: Uses nws18_qmb (editorial sentiment) to identify overreaction; apply reverse() to express mean-reversion. Backfilled. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence: 0.58.
Track rp_ess_partner with ts_decay_linear to emphasize recent partner announcements. Backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.64.
Use rp_nip_product (impact projection) and apply ts_zscore to capture expected price move. Backfilled. Confidence: 0.67.
Uses rp_css_marketing; backfilled and ts_zscore to find momentum in marketing-related coverage. SUGGESTION4 used to pick higher userCount when possible. Confidence: 0.62.
Use rp_css_ptg and rp_nip_ptg divergence: composite vs impact projection. Both backfilled and differenced. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.70.
Use rp_css_insider (composite insider news) backfilled and zscored for momentum. Applied SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.59.
Use rp_css_credit (credit composite) and ts_zscore to detect credit concerns. Backfilled. Confidence conservative given lower userCount: 0.55.

results.idea: Projected ratings impact vs composite ratings tone
results.description: Compare rp_nip_ratings (impact) and rp_css_ratings (composite) to capture rating surprises. Both backfilled. SUGGESTIONS 1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.74.
Use ts_delta of rp_css_earnings to capture acceleration. Backfilled. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Negative legal impact projection vs composite
results.description: Compare rp_nip_legal to rp_css_legal to find cases where impact projection exceeds composite negativity. Backfilled both. Confidence: 0.63.
Use nws18_qcm (high confidence news sentiment) as cleaner signal; zscore with backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Composite product sentiment vs event product sentiment
results.description: Compare rp_css_product and rp_ess_product for divergent signals; both backfilled. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Rapid change in analyst coverage vs composite
results.description: Use nws18_ghc_lna with rp_css_business to see if recommendation changes contradict business sentiment. Both backfilled. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Weights nws18_event_relevance by rp_css_business via multiply to emphasize relevant business news. Both backfilled and winsorized. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.65.
Use rp_css_market(=rp_css_marketing) short-term negative spikes reversed for mean reversion. Backfilled. Chose marketing as proxy for editorial market tone. Confidence: 0.57.
Use ts_returns on rp_nip_revenue to capture expected price move from revenue-related news. Backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Use ts_zscore then cross-sectional zscore (zscore operator) on rp_css_revenue; backfilled first. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.70.

results.idea: News impact persistence: IR of impact projection
results.description: Use ts_ir on rp_nip_business to measure persistent impact vs volatility. Backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Use rp_ess_technical event sentiment, backfilled and ts_arg_max to find recent peaks. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.61.
Use rp_css_price with reverse of ts_zscore to trade mean-reversion after extreme price-related sentiment. Backfilled. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Partner announcement impact vs projected impact
results.description: Compare rp_ess_partner (event) and rp_nip_partner (impact) to find under- or over-estimated partner news. Backfilled both. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.67.
Multiply rp_css_business by nws18_event_relevance to emphasize highly relevant business news. Backfilled. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Use ts_returns on rp_nip_ptg after backfill to capture momentum from negative PTG projections. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Composite assets sentiment vs product sentiment divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_css_assets and rp_css_product zscores after backfill to spot misaligned asset vs product narratives. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.60.

results.idea: Event sentiment kurtosis for volatility warning
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis on rp_ess_business to detect fat-tail event sentiment distributions. Backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.58.
Use rp_css_equity backfilled and ts_zscore to capture sentiment toward equity actions (buybacks, splits). SUGGESTION4 preference for higher alphaCount. Confidence: 0.65.

results.idea: Investor-impact projection momentum filtered by relevance
results.description: Multiply rp_nip_inverstor by nws18_event_relevance to favor impactful, relevant investor news. Backfilled both. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence: 0.75.
Reverse short-term ts_zscore on rp_css_earnings to trade mean reversion after extreme earnings sentiment. Backfilled. Confidence: 0.63.
Use ts_decay_linear on rp_nip_business to emphasize recent impactful news while backfilling. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.
Use ts_rank on nws18_qcm (high confidence) after backfill to create cross-sectional signal. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.72.
Compare rp_ess_marketing (event) and rp_css_marketing (composite) to spot surprise positivity. Backfilled both. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Insider event impact vs composite expectation
results.description: Compare rp_ess_insider and rp_css_insider to identify insider events with outsized projected impact. Both backfilled. Confidence: 0.64.
Use rp_ess_society kurtosis or extreme zscore after backfill to detect social risk events. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Projected product impact vs composite product tone
results.description: Subtract rp_nip_product and rp_css_product zscores after backfill to identify underpriced product-impact news. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Use nws18_qep (global equity word sentiment) zscore after backfill to capture surprising editorial tone. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.59.
Compare rp_css_credit and rp_nip_credit to detect credit stories with underestimated impact. Both backfilled. Confidence: 0.56.
Use nws18_event_similarity_days with days_from_last_change to detect rare-event recency; backfilled. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Confidence: 0.54.
Use rp_css_technical and ts_arg_max after backfill to find instruments with recent technical-sentiment peaks. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.60.
Run ts_ir on rp_nip_earnings after backfill to favor stable, predictable earnings-impact names. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Composite price momentum filtered by editorials
results.description: Multiply ts_zscore of rp_css_price with ts_zscore of nws18_qmb to favor price-sentiment moves supported by editorials. Backfilled both. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by nws18_event_relevance after backfill to favor highly relevant earnings coverage. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.73.
Reverse ts_zscore on rp_css_marketing after backfill to capture mean-reversion in marketing hype. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.56.
ts_zscore on rp_nip_partner after backfill to trade expected partner-driven moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.65.
Reverse ts_zscore of rp_css_ratings after backfill to short names with sudden negative ratings sentiment. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Event sentiment count of NaNs as data-quality signal
results.description: Use ts_count_nans on rp_ess_business to detect sparse coverage spikes (possible idiosyncratic events). Backfilled before counting per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.50.

results.idea: Composite revenue vs price sentiment divergence
results.description: Subtract rp_css_revenue zscore and rp_css_price zscore after backfill to detect revenue stories not yet priced. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.70.
Compute short ts_zscore minus long ts_zscore on rp_css_business to find momentum crossovers. Backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Use rp_nip_ratings ts_zscore after backfill to trade ratings impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.72.
Use rp_css_dividends backfilled and ts_zscore to capture positive dividend-related momentum. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.55.
Subtract nws18_bee (earnings growth sentiment) from rp_css_earnings to detect disagreement. Both backfilled. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Use ts_sum on rp_ess_product after backfill to capture accumulation of product events. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.61.
ts_zscore on rp_css_partner after backfill to capture trending partner narratives. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Rapid change in stock-price sentiment vs impact
results.description: Difference between rp_css_price and rp_nip_price zscores after backfill to find mispriced price-news. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.71.
Reverse ts_zscore on rp_css_society after backfill to play fade of social-story hype. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Projected marketing impact vs composite tone
results.description: Subtract rp_nip_marketing and rp_css_marketing zscores after backfill to capture under/overestimated marketing effects. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.60.
Reverse ts_zscore on rp_css_credit_ratings after backfill to short names with sudden credit-ratings negativity. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.59.
Use ts_ir on rp_ess_partner to prefer persistent partner-sentiment instruments. Backfilled. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
ts_zscore on rp_css_ptg after backfill to capture PTG-driven sentiment moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.64.
Use ts_product or ts_sum on nws18_ghc_lna after backfill to detect sustained recommendation shifts. Chose ts_sum for simplicity. Confidence: 0.62.
Use ts_std_dev on rp_css_inverstor after backfill to avoid noisy names (prefer stable signals). SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.67.
Subtract rp_css_earnings and rp_css_revenue zscores after backfill to find mismatch. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.
ts_zscore on rp_ess_ratings after backfill to capture event-driven rating moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.7.
Multiply rp_css_earnings by nws18_event_relevance after backfill to focus on relevant earnings stories. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.74.

results.idea: News-impact acceleration: delta of impact projection
results.description: Compute ts_delta on rp_nip_business after backfill to detect accelerating impact projections. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
ts_sum on rp_ess_equity after backfill to capture accumulation of equity-action events. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.62.
ts_rank on ts_zscore of rp_css_product after backfill to get cross-sectional relative strength. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.65.
Subtract rp_nip_insider and rp_css_insider after backfill to spot insiders with outsized projected impact. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Cross-sectional zscore on rp_css_earnings to generate relative longs/shorts after backfill. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.72.
Apply hump to ts_zscore of rp_nip_revenue after backfill to smooth turnover while capturing impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Composite partner sentiment reversal after spike
results.description: Reverse short ts_zscore on rp_css_partner after backfill to capture reversals post big partner news spikes. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.61.
normalize(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(rp_css_price,5),10)) to remove cross-sectional mean and capture idiosyncratic moves. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.7.
Multiply rp_css_earnings and nws18_bee after backfill to favor earnings stories with supportive editorial growth sentiment. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Use ts_std_dev on rp_nip_price after backfill to avoid highly volatile impact projections. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.
Subtract rp_css_technical and nws18_qmb zscores after backfill to detect technical sentiment unsupported by editorial tone. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.58.
Multiply rp_nip_product with rp_nip_price after backfill to find products that also project price impact. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.67.
Prefer names with low ts_std_dev on rp_css_earnings after backfill indicating stable positive coverage. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.7.
Multiply rp_nip_ratings by nws18_event_relevance after backfill to focus on relevant rating events. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.73.
Subtract rp_css_marketing and rp_css_product zscores after backfill to find marketing hype unsupported by product sentiment. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.57.
Subtract short and long ts_zscore on rp_css_inverstor (5 vs 20) after backfill to detect acceleration. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
ts_zscore on rp_css_assets after backfill to capture asset-related news momentum. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.61.
Subtract rp_css_earnings and nws18_ghc_lna zscores after backfill to find earnings narratives not aligned with analyst changes. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Projected revenue impact momentum with smoothing
results.description: Apply ts_decay_linear to rp_nip_revenue after backfill to favor recent revenue-impact shifts. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.69.
Multiply rp_css_technical and rp_ess_technical after backfill to favor technical signals backed by events. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.63.
Multiply rp_nip_business by reverse(ts_zscore(nws18_qmb)) after backfill to focus on negative editorials with projected impact. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.60.
Subtract nws18_qcm and rp_css_business after backfill to capture high-confidence editorial disagreement vs business composite. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
Multiply rp_css_earnings with nws18_event_relevance then zscore after backfill to prioritize relevant earnings stories. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.75.
Divide ts_zscore of rp_css_price by ts_std_dev of rp_nip_price after backfill to adjust for impact volatility. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.7.
Reverse short ts_zscore on rp_css_product after backfill to fade product hype. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.59.
Add ts_zscore of rp_css_earnings and ts_zscore of rp_nip_ratings after backfill to create consensus high-impact signal. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.76.
ts_arg_max on rp_ess_price after backfill to favor most recent peak price-related events. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.62.
Subtract rp_css_marketing and rp_css_inverstor after backfill to detect conflicting narratives. SUGGESTION1/3 applied. Confidence: 0.58.
zscore(ts_sum(rp_ess_partner)) after backfill to find names with sustained partner-event accumulation. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.64.
ts_arg_max on rp_css_earnings after backfill to detect recent maximal earnings sentiment. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.67.
normalize(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(rp_nip_revenue,5),10)) to isolate idiosyncratic revenue-impact signals. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence: 0.68.
